[https://videotheque.uness.fr/w/2byuuZFUNHTbN2VR81yvZa Know the conditions for inserting a central venous line]

question.question: What are the common complications associated with inserting a central venous catheter?

options.A: The insertion of a central venous catheter can lead to infection.
options.B: The insertion of a central venous catheter is a common procedure in intensive care units.
options.C: The insertion of a central venous catheter can cause nerve damage.
options.D: The insertion of a central venous catheter can cause bleeding in the vein.
